H0.text: What Cantonese mixed bite-size food means literally 'touch the heart'. Yumcha

H1.text: What Cantonese mixed bite-size food means literally 'touch the heart'. Siu Mai

H2.text: What Cantonese mixed bite-size food means literally 'touch the heart'. Har Gow

H3.text: What Cantonese mixed bite-size food means literally 'touch the heart'. Dimsum

A4.text: dim sum translates literally to 'touch the heart'.

A5.text: The second, 點心, which means dim sum, translates literally to 'touch the heart'.
